## lin\_P3\_to\_XYZ() function

Convert an array of linear-light display-p3 values to CIE XYZ using D65 (no chromatic adaptation)

 W3C https://www.w3.org/Consortium/Legal/2015/copyright-software-and-document  This software or document includes material copied from or derived from https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/blob/main/css-color-4/conversions.js. Copyright © 2022 W3C® (MIT, ERCIM, Keio, Beihang).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function lin_P3_to_XYZ(rgb: Color): Color;
```
